text: mariyu urumu ayana pavitratanu koniyadutundi. Ayana stotram cestundi; mariyu daivadutalu kuda ayana bhayanto (ayana stotram cestu untaru)! Mariyu ayana phelaphelamane urumulanu pampi, vati dvara tanu korina varini siksistadu. Ayina viru (satyatiraskarulu) allah nu gurinci vaduladutunnaru. Mariyu ayana adbhuta yuktiparudu
